column4: My box is a 1.67G AMD 32-bit.  So, in theory, I can install VMWare without 3D support, and an older program like, say, Frogger 2 (7 years old, I believe) and have a reasonable shot at it running.  Or am I off base here?
The 3D card is an ATI Radeon 8500.
I'm kind of an old school gamer, not a lot of current titles thrill me.  ;-)
heh i hear ya man. Ive been playing Larry 5 on dosbox
